msItem.title: Siyar ul-Muta'akhkhirin.
msItem.note: Folio one, recto, stamp, the name filled in by hand: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by John Romer Esq On European paper with watemarks, including RICARDO. Vol. I, from the death of Aurangzib to A.H. 1152. Part of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 110. References; As for Codrington/Reade No 110. For the provenance see Donations Register for November 18 1848. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: Black leather blind-stamped Indian binding. Twentieth-century replacement spine, with tooled title etc.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of India, Mughal dynasty, eighteenth century.
